<h3 id="X38734">X(38734) = X(98)-CIRCUM-EULER-POINT OF X(546)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^8-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(b^4+8*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^4+2*(2*b^2-c^2)*(b^2-2*c^2)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)^4  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(38734) = X(3)-3*X(115) = 2*X(3)-3*X(6036) = X(3)+3*X(6321) = 5*X(3)-9*X(38224) = 7*X(3)-3*X(38730) = 13*X(3)-9*X(38731) = X(3)-9*X(38732) = 5*X(3)+3*X(38733) = 4*X(3)-9*X(38735) = 4*X(3)-3*X(38736) = 7*X(3)-9*X(38737) = 5*X(3)-3*X(38738) = 11*X(3)-15*X(38739) = 3*X(3)-5*X(38740) = 3*X(115)-2*X(20398) = 5*X(115)-3*X(38224) = 7*X(115)-X(38730) = 13*X(115)-3*X(38731) = X(115)-3*X(38732) = 5*X(115)+X(38733) = 4*X(115)-3*X(38735) = 4*X(115)-X(38736) = 7*X(115)-3*X(38737) = 5*X(115)-X(38738) = 11*X(115)-5*X(38739) = 9*X(115)-5*X(38740)
</b>
<p>
Let N<sub>A</sub> be the reflection of X(5) in the A-altitude, and define N<sub>B</sub> and N<sub>C</sub> cyclically.  N<sub>A</sub>N<sub>B</sub>N<sub>C</sub> is inversely similar to ABC, with similitude center X(195).  X(38734) = X(187)-of-N<sub>A</sub>N<sub>B</sub>N<sub>C</sub>.  (see Hyacinthos #21522, 2/11/2013, Antreas Hatzipolakis)  (Randy Hutson, May 31, 2020)
</p>
<p>
X(38734) lies on these lines: {2,10992}, {3,115}, {4,542}, {5,543}, {20,6055}, {30,11623}, {98,3146}, {99,3090}, {114,148}, {140,5461}, {338,32257}, {381,14981}, {382,10991}, {395,20416}, {396,20415}, {546,2782}, {547,36521}, {575,5254}, {620,3628}, {631,9166}, {632,6722}, {690,24978}, {1656,2482}, {2783,38757}, {2784,38769}, {2785,38781}, {2793,38801}, {2794,3627}, {2936,7529}, {2996,10754}, {3303,13183}, {3304,13182}, {3455,7517}, {3523,12117}, {3525,13172}, {3526,14971}, {3529,10723}, {3832,6054}, {3851,8724}, {3858,22566}, {5055,15300}, {5056,8591}, {5068,8596}, {5070,9167}, {5072,13188}, {5073,14830}, {5076,12188}, {5079,15561}, {5182,32979}, {5286,22234}, {5465,30714}, {5477,11482}, {5882,12258}, {5965,13449}, {6425,8980}, {6426,13967}, {6772,16634}, {6775,16635}, {7530,13233}, {7620,11178}, {7745,22330}, {7828,35950}, {7841,19662}, {7982,13178}, {8370,25555}, {8960,35699}, {9761,22575}, {9763,22576}, {9875,11522}, {10303,21166}, {10358,32135}, {11005,15044}, {11177,17578}, {11185,24206}, {11477,11646}, {11648,37348}, {11725,15178}, {12042,15704}, {12103,38747}, {12812,15092}, {14561,14928}, {14832,18114}, {14869,34127}, {15022,20094}, {15027,15357}, {15359,20397}, {16220,18007}, {17538,34473}, {18546,37242}, {34505,34507}</p>
<p>
X(38734) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {114, 148}, {115, 6321}, {382, 10991}, {671, 9880}, {2482, 12355}, {10723, 38749}, {16001, 16002}, {25154, 31696}, {25164, 31695}, {38733, 38738}<br>
X(38734) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 20398), (99, 6721), (6036, 115), (33813, 6722), (36521, 547), (38736, 6036), (38745, 546), (38749, 35021)<br>
X(38734) = complement of X(10992)<br>
X(38734) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 115, 20398), (3, 20398, 6036), (99, 3090, 38751), (99, 23514, 6721), (115, 6036, 38735), (115, 38738, 38224), (148, 3091, 23235), (148, 14639, 114), (382, 11632, 10991), (3090, 38751, 6721), (3091, 23235, 114), (6321, 38224, 38733), (6321, 38732, 115), (14639, 23235, 3091), (23514, 38751, 3090), (31695, 31696, 1992), (33813, 38229, 6722), (35830, 35831, 7746), (38224, 38733, 38738), (38735, 38736, 6036)<br>
</p>
